scene_description_enriched: A full-body anatomical illustration depicts a standing male figure with an opened torso revealing internal organs, primarily the heart and lungs, rendered in red. The figure's skin is pale, and its eyes are closed. Surrounding the figure are golden stars and flowing banners with Latin inscriptions. Below the standing figure, a smaller, seated figure in red and yellow attire with a hooded head looks upwards with a smile. The background is a vibrant blue, suggesting a celestial or abstract setting.
